footer.title: NepaliGPT can make mistakes. Check important information.

faq.subheader: Have questions? We're here to help.

item1.question: What is NepaliGPT?
item1.answer: NepaliGPT is an AI agent based search engine which provides accurate and up-to-date answers backed by sources.

item2.question: How is it different from other search engines?

answer.caption: Comparison of NepaliGpt and perperxility features

item3.question: What is Agentic AI search?
item3.answer: Agentic AI search does multilevel reasoning and planning to get the right answer.

item4.question: Do I need NepaliGPT pro?
item4.answer: Not really, we provide 10 queries per day. If you want more queries, you can upgrade to the pro version.

item5.question: Is my search queries private?
item5.answer: We bill monthly or annually, depending on your preference. All plans are billed in advance.

item6.question: How do I change my account email?
item6.answer: You can change your account email from your account settings page. A confirmation will be sent to your new email.
